homepage_hero_title: Track your Pole Dance progress
homepage_hero_description: Spinella is the simplest way to track your progress. Discover new moves in the catalog, add them to your collection, and watch as your 'Want to do' status transforms into 'Done' üéâ
homepage_features_title: Everything you need in one place
homepage_features_description: Spinella is a simple and intuitive tool that transforms your training into a conscious journey. All your moves, notes, and progress in one place.
homepage_features_1_description: Discover hundreds of pole dance moves. Each with a description, difficulty level, and step-by-step instructions. Your next favorite move is already here.
homepage_features_2_description: Mark moves as 'Want to do', 'Almost there', or 'Done'. Watch how your 'Done' list grows with every training session!
homepage_features_3_description: Write down your thoughts, tricks, and observations for each move. Your notes are only for you ‚Äì safe and always at hand.
homepage_benefits_description: No more cluttered notes and forgotten goals. Spinella is your organized space, where every move has its place and every progress is noticed.
homepage_benefits_3: Mark the status of each move
homepage_benefits_5: All your moves in one place
homepage_cta_title: Track your pole dance progress ‚Äì simply and effectively
homepage_cta_description: Explore the move catalog, change statuses, and add private notes. Spinella helps you return to training with a clear plan.
homepage_meta_title: Spinella: Track your pole dance progress
homepage_meta_description: Change chaos into progress. Spinella is your place to track pole dance move learning, note tricks and celebrate progress. Join and see how quickly you grow stronger!
homepage_meta_og_title: Spinella: Your Pole Dance Journal - Master Every Move
homepage_meta_og_description: Change chaos into progress. Spinella is your place to track pole dance move learning, note tricks and celebrate progress. Join and see how quickly you grow stronger!

catalog_meta_description: Browse our collection of pole dance moves. Filter by difficulty level, search by name, and discover new techniques to master.
catalog_meta_og_description: Browse our collection of pole dance moves. Filter by difficulty level and discover new techniques.
catalog_header_subtitle: Browse and track your progress with our move catalog.

my_moves_empty_description: Start adding moves to your collection to track your progress. Browse the catalog and choose moves you want to practice.
